Name: Helime
description:
Helime is 48 years old, married, and has two daughters and two sons. She has secondary education. Helime is engaged in agriculture on 1.0 hectares of land, cultivating organic onions. 

Helime has decided to develop her business and has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 30,000 som (KGS) in order to buy seeds and fertilisers for cultivating and selling organic onions. She plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further expansion of her business and in increasing her land area for crops.
